message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product for $1000000. It's a truly unique opportunity and I believe it holds immense value.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $850000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your counteroffer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $850000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to see $950000 to make this work.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not able to meet at $950000. I would like to propose $900000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're still not at my ideal price, but I'm willing to be flexible.  I'm confident this product will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm willing to compromise at $925000.  This is a fair price that reflects both our needs. Let's close this deal.
